name: Befriendtown
description:
The Proof-of-Concept demo only supports Windows, as we do not have Linux/Mac testers.

--

Befriendtown is a Minecraft: Story Mode... dating sim? But there's no dating. We asked a parrot, and they said social simulator - so that's what this is!

You are the Reader, a protagonist you can name yourself as you befriend the residents of Beacontown and beyond, finding yourself speaking to all(?) of your favourite Minecraft: Story Mode characters.

Minecraft Story Mode (c) Telltale Games and Mojang. 

This is fanfiction packaged as freeware.
